STATUS, u.ssex, d.id deptId, d.dept_name deptName, u.AVATAR, u.user_type userType, u.DESCRIPTION, u.NAME, u.u9code, u.vender_id venderId, u.LAST_LOGIN_TIME lastLoginTime, r.id roleId, r.ROLE_NAME roleName FROM t_user u LEFT JOIN t_dept d ON (u.dept_id = d.id) LEFT JOIN t_user_role ur ON (u.id = ur.user_id) LEFT JOIN t_role r ON r.id = ur.role_id WHERE u.username = #{username} order by u.last_modified_date desc
